content: elevate your look with this radiant shawl that s ideal for daywear or dress it up for the evening red heart boutique unforgettable does all the work as you easily crochet rich and juicy shade transitions craft it as shown or take a different color journey to finish a versatile gift for someone special shawl is worked flat from the top down with a picot edge and finished shoulder edge worked seamlessly onto the shawl gauge 6 shells = 4 10 cm 9 row = 4 10 cm in shell pattern red heart® boutique unforgettable™ 3 balls
